description: Information about International Baccalaureate courses and exams
text_data: The International Baccalaureate (IB) Diploma Programme is a challenging two-year curriculum for students aged 16-19. It leads to a qualification recognized by leading universities worldwide.

IB English HL (Higher Level) is a rigorous course that focuses on literary analysis, critical thinking, and writing skills. Students study 13 works of literature from different time periods and cultures.

IB assessments include both internal assessments (graded by teachers and moderated by IB) and external examinations (graded by IB examiners). For English HL, the external assessment consists of two exam papers.
